physdesc.extent: in one folder and one oversize folder.

did.abstract: The Brooklyn Neighborhoods and How They Grew exhibit photograph collection consists of 12 photographs dating from circa 1875 to 1987. The photographs were part of the Brooklyn Historical Society's Brooklyn Neighborhoods and How They Grew exhibit, circa 1988. Photographs in the collection show street scenes, dwellings, and undeveloped land in the Bedford-Stuyvesant, Flatbush, East Flatbush, Brooklyn Heights, and Sheepshead Bay neighborhoods of Brooklyn.

altformavail.p: Item-level description and digital versions of images from the collection are available for searching via the image database in the library under the object ID prefix V1974.034.
